channel.title: Donor Cape

item.title: Donor Cape
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

	[code=java]case 16022:
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[4];
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[4];
		itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 57280;
		itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 54503;
		itemDef.originalModelColors[2] = 54183;
		itemDef.originalModelColors[3] = 11200;
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 9152;
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 7104;
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors[2] = 7104;
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors[3] = 796;
		itemDef.modelID = 4;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
		itemDef.modelRotationY = 572;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 69;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
		itemDef.anInt204 = 14;
		itemDef.anInt165 = 5;
		itemDef.anInt200 = 5;
		itemDef.name = "Donator Cape";
		itemDef.description = "The cape of donators.".getBytes();
		break;[/code]

Ok i tried to add this to my ItemDef.java file in my client i converted it using Vains converting chart and im still getting 6 errors can someone help me fix?
here are the errors

ItemDef.java:1182: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; ^ ItemDef.java:1183: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; ^ ItemDef.java:1196: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modelRotationY location: class ItemDef itemDef.modelRotationY = 572; ^ ItemDef.java:1197: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modelRotationX location: class ItemDef itemDef.modelRotationX = 69; ^ ItemDef.java:1201: cannot find symbol symbol : variable anInt165 location: class ItemDef itemDef.anInt165 = 5; ^ ItemDef.java:1202: cannot find symbol symbol : variable anInt200 location: class ItemDef itemDef.anInt200 = 5; ^

Read full topic
